casebody.head_matter:
Edward Robert STEINER, petitioner,
v.
Julie L. JONES, Secretary, Florida Department of Corrections, et al.; Edward Robert Steiner, petitioner,
v.
Julie L. Jones, Secretary, Florida Department of Corrections, et al.; and Edward Robert Steiner, petitioner,
v.
Julie L. Jones, Secretary, Florida Department of Corrections, et al.
No. 17-5921.
Supreme Court of the United States
Nov. 13, 2017.
Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and the petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
